title: Louise Haigh – 2021 Comments on ‘Rail Betrayal’
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Louise Haigh, the Shadow Secretary of State for Transport, on 8 December 2021.
content:
Northern communities are, once again, paying the price for broken Tory promises on rail.
